definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時將近結束，大家可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道故事情節將怎樣結束。

sentences.english: The slavery was overthrown after the Civil War in U.S.A.
sentences.chinese: 在南北戰爭結束之後，美國的奴隸制被廢除了。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 內戰結束後，美國南北方的人民都面臨着艱鉅的任務。

sentences.english: So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 後來，化療結束以後，病人出現了血尿。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 專業運動員被完全接受，終於在比賽結束的業餘傳統。

sentences.english: This records the start and end time of the reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 這記錄着複製的開始和結束時間。
風箏要以機頭向上的姿態結束動作。

sentences.english: The performance was rounded off with group-singing.
sentences.chinese: 演出在合唱聲中圓滿結束。

sentences.english: Station WRC is off the air now. They signed off two hours ago.
sentences.chinese: WRC臺現在沒節目了，它在兩個小時前結束了廣播。

sentences.english: A burst of hand-clapping followed the end of the song.
sentences.chinese: 歌聲結束後是一陣熱烈的掌聲。

sentences.english: Singleton's counsel said after the trial that he would appeal.
sentences.chinese: 審判結束後，辛格爾頓的律師表示他將會上訴。

sentences.english: The turbulent meeting ended in a fist fight.
sentences.chinese: 吵鬧的會議最終以拳腳相向而結束。

sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 那家報紙出版號外宣佈戰爭結束的消息。

sentences.english: After three years, Deborah tried to break off the relationship and escape from Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 三年後，黛博拉試圖結束這段關係，逃離約夏的掌控。

sentences.english: Her behavior returned to normal after the quake.
sentences.chinese: 她的舉止在地震結束後就恢復了正常。

definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
